title: Jhumka Store
description: The first-ever website I built. Simple, but it got me started.

title: Portfolio V1
description: My first portfolio website. Nothing fancy, just a start.

title: Socially
description: My first fullstack social media app with auth, posts, likes, and explore feed. Took time to set up backend properly with Clerk and Prisma.

title: Spectra Play
description: First semester project with a 5-member team. Took around 20 days—or a month.

title: Green Money
description: Experimented with animations while recreating Pinterest-like visuals. Dark section has the best effects.

title: Space Explorers
description: Full-page animated experience with SVGs, smooth scrolling, and text effects. Took 3 weeks to optimize this beast!

title: Dead SKULL
description: A page with 3D models, background effects, and seamless transitions.

title: MORESPEC UI
description: Tried making a cool animated UI. Learned that GSAP & plain HTML isn't the best combo.

title: Space Explorers (Raw)
description: Same as above, but unoptimized—showing how much performance matters.

title: Navbar Animation
description: A landing page with smooth GSAP animations from my early experiments.

title: Loaders Pack
description: A collection of custom loading animations with background effects.

title: Maniks API
description: Built a small API to fetch card data via GitHub—basic but functional.

title: Himesh Dua - Portfolio
description: A modern developer portfolio built with Next.js and Appwrite backend. Features dynamic project listings powered by environment variables, sleek UI with Tailwind CSS, smooth animations via Framer Motion, and form handling with Besan Form. Deployed on Netlify with CI/CD workflow and secured with best practices.

title: Aunty Palace
description: Designed a simple online store for women's accessories. For the first time I tried filtering using JavaScript

title: Hems Constructions
description: An early project from my learning phase. Not the most responsive, but it got me coding.

title: Admin Panel UI
description: A simple admin panel UI built as a favor for a friend.
